Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE SEGUROS.seguros.v0credicober T1 SET SITUACAO = :SITUACAO WHERE COD_SUREG = :COD_SUREG AND COD_AGENCIA = :COD_AGENCIA AND CODOPER = :CODOPER AND NUM_CONTRATO = :NUM_CONTRATO AND CONTRATO_DIGITO = :CONTRATO_DIGITO AND DTINIVIG <= :DTINIVIG AND DTTERVIG >= :DTINIVIG AND SITUACAO IN ('3','S','B') END SQL
